title: Giro d’Italia Stage 14: Crash Causes GC Carnage as Roglič, Ayuso Lose Time; Asgreen Wins From Break
content:
Asgreen stuns with solo win after surviving from early breakaway, Del Toro takes 1:20 lead in pink jersey fight after crash upends the top of classification.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 14: Crash Causes GC Carnage as Roglič, Ayuso Lose Time; Asgreen Wins From Break on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
